about.title: Prispievateľia
app.title: keepassxc browser
credentials.removeNotice: Nebude k nim mať viac prístup.
credentials.selected: {count, plural, one {# heslo } other {# heslá}} vybraté
credentials.subtitle:
Ak keepassxc-browser nedetekuje meno a heslo správne, je možné ich ručne nastaviť
kliknutím na ikonu keepassxc-browsera a následne na Choose own credential fields for this page. 
Na tejto stránke môžete spravovať tieto položky.
credentials.title: Specified credential fields
databases.norecords: Zatiaľ nie sú pripojené žiadne databázy
databases.removeNotice: K uloženým heslám v {count, plural, one {tejto databáze} other {týchto databázach}}, nebute mať viac prístup bez znovupripojenia k {count, plural, one {databázy} other {databáz}}.
databases.selected: {count, plural, one {# databáza vybratá} other {# databázy vybraté}}
databases.subtitle: Nasledovné databázy su pripojené ku keepassxc-browser
databases.title: Pripojené databázy
settings.general.autoCompleteUsernameDes: For all username fields on a page a dropdown list appears which contains all available credentials
settings.general.autoFillHttpAuthDialogs: Auto fill HTTP Auth dialogs and send them.
If credentials are found for a page and the login-type is an HTTP Auth request, keepassxc-browser tries to login with the first given credentials.
settings.general.autoFillInSingleDesc: If keepassxc-browser does only receive a single entry from KeePassXC it automatically fills this credentials into the found credential fields
settings.general.blinkTimeDesc: Maximum time (ms) the icon should blink after detecting new credentials
settings.general.checkUpdatesDesc: Setup automatic check for KeePassXC updates
settings.general.customizeShortcuts: You can customize these shortcuts on {configureUrl} page.
settings.general.downloadLink: keepassxc-browser needs KeePassXC to retrieve credentials. You can download the latest stable version from here: {link}
settings.general.passwordGeneratorDesc:
For all password-fields there will be an icon added to generate a new password.
It is generated by KeePassXC with the profile for automatically generated passwords for new entries
settings.general.redirectAllowanceDesc:
How many pages should the tab cycle through after the redirect offset before deactivating the icon 
Default: 1
settings.general.redirectOffsetDesc:
What is the minimum time (ms) the icon should blink before deactivating due to page redirects. 
-1 to only use Blink Time ignoring Redirect Allowance (old behavior) 
Default: -1, Recommended: 2000
settings.general.retrieveCredentialsDesc: keepassxc-browser will immediately retrieve the credentials when the tab is activated
settings.general.title: Všeobecné
settings.shortcuts.inserPasswordDesc: Vloží sa heslo na miesto s fokusom
settings.shortcuts.inserUserNamePassword: Na miesto s fokusom sa vloží meno a heslo.
settings.unsafe.autoFillInSingleDesc: If keepassxc-browser does only receive a single entry from KeePassXC it automatically fills this credentials into the found credential fields
settings.updates.checkUpdatesDesc: Setup automatic check for KeePassXC updates
settings.updates.downloadLink: keepassxc-browser needs KeePassXC to retrieve credentials. You can download the latest stable version from here: {link}
